subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Bishop, hindered by an undisclosed injury that appeared to affect his mobility, made 36 saves to lead Tampa Bay to a two-games-to-one advantage over the Chicago Blackhawks.
snippet: Bishop, hindered by an undisclosed injury that appeared to affect his mobility, made 36 saves to lead Tampa Bay to a two-games-to-one advantage over the Chicago Blackhawks.
